content.rendered:
Directed by Ravi Adhikari

Written by Ravi Adhikari. Rehan Khan. Sarim Momin

Cast Satish Kaushik( Bhisham Roy8 episodes, 2022 ). Ashutosh Rana( Guru Shastri8 episodes, 2022 ). Paoli Dam( Indrani Roy8 episodes, 2022 ). Pranay Pachauri( Samar Shastri8 episodes, 2022 ). Ankit Bisht( Abhimanyu Roy8 episodes, 2022 ). Madhurima Roy( Hunar Agarwal8 episodes, 2022 ). Anjana Sukhani( Mounisha8 episodes, 2022 ). Akash Dhar( Saahas Allu8 episodes, 2022 ). Chandan Roy Sanyal( Aadesh Baghchi8 episodes, 2022 ). Satyajit Sharma( Iqbal Singh Bajwa8 episodes, 2022 ). Tara-Alisha Berry( Fiza Ayubi7 episodes, 2022 ). Rajneesh Sharma( Local CBI7 episodes, 2022 ). Kundan Roy( Local CBI7 episodes, 2022 ). Pranay Narayan( Hunar’s Father – Gajanand Agarwal7 episodes, 2022 ). Nitin Mirani( Raghuveer Singh6 episodes, 2022 ). Shruti Chauhan( Rashi Motvani6 episodes, 2022 ). Malkhan Singh Gaur( Factory Fire Survivor6 episodes, 2022 ). Rajesh Khattar( Vardhaan Roy5 episodes, 2022 ). Aashit Chatterjee( Kannu Sudarshan5 episodes, 2022 ). Gavin Methalaka( George Masih5 episodes, 2022 ). Sachin Parikh( Bhisham’s PA – Debashish5 episodes, 2022 ). Reshma Merchant( Hunar’s Mother – Maitri Agarwal5 episodes, 2022 ). Atharv Padhye( Hunar’s Brother – Ninad Agarwal5 episodes, 2022 ). Radhika Chauhan( Radhika – Hunar’s Friend5 episodes, 2022 ). Soundarya Sharma( Payal Rana4 episodes, 2022 ). Rituraj Singh( Viral Motvani4 episodes, 2022 ). Amy Aela( Isabelle #14 episodes, 2022 ). Utkarsh Kohli( Tapish4 episodes, 2022 ). Lalit Rawat( Ankur4 episodes, 2022 ). Ajay Datta( Moses Ghose3 episodes, 2022 ). Pankaj Vishnu( Insp. Shaikh3 episodes, 2022 ). Ashok Kumar( Moses’ Aide – Dravid3 episodes, 2022 ). Guru Haryani( Viral’s Manager – Ramesh Bhagnani3 episodes, 2022 ). Rakesh Dubey( Acharya Ji3 episodes, 2022 ). Sanjay Gurbaxani( Ujjwal Motvani2 episodes, 2022 ). Vishal Karwal( Gaurav Shastri2 episodes, 2022 ). Arun Malik( Arab Sheikh2 episodes, 2022 ). Nia( Indrani’s PA2 episodes, 2022 ). Rehmat Ali( Raghuveer’s Captor2 episodes, 2022 ). Zeeshan( Raghuveer’s Captor2 episodes, 2022 ). Ahmar Khan( Raghuveer’s Captor2 episodes, 2022 ). Dimple( Bajwa’s Wife1 episode, 2022 ). Meela Singh( Isabelle #21 episode, 2022 ). Nitin Dahiya( Ninad’s Friend1 episode, 2022 ). Vishnu Sharma( Indrani’s Father – Ex-Police Commissioner1 episode, 2022 ). Madhu Awasthi( Naxalite1 episode, 2022 ). Pragya Mishra( Naxalite1 episode, 2022 ). Sulagna Mukherjee( Allu’s Fake Wife1 episode, 2022 ). Manish Kumar( Naxalite1 episode, 2022 ). Sudhakar Gaonkar( Naxalite1 episode, 2022 ). Aarzoo Ali( Inspector at Bagchi’s Arrest1 episode, 2022 ). Amit Gupta( Police Guard1 episode, 2022 ). Kingshuk( Inspector at Samar’s Arrest1 episode, 2022 ). Arya Chaturvedi( Constable at Bagchi’s Arrest1 episode, 2022 ). Gopal Raj( Old Villager1 episode, 2022 ). Mafruj Mondal( Real Estate Contractor1 episode, 2022 ). Sandeep Dutta( Shouting Village Kid1 episode, 2022 )

Language Hindi

Producers Gautam Adhikari. Kailashnath Adhikari. Ravi Adhikari. Amit K. Bhargava. Karn Gupta. Vinayak Naresh Jain. Makrand Adhikari. Markand Adhikari

Production Happi Digital.

Certificate 16+

Season 1

Episodes 8
